messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Live Free Learn Free magazine
messages.msgSnippet: Same here. I totally loved that magazine and subscribed for 2 years but have also been waiting for some time for more issues. ... From: swissarmy_wife
messages.messageBody:
Same here. I totally loved that magazine and subscribed for 2 years but have also been waiting for some time for more issues.

----- Original Message ----
From: swissarmy_wife <heatherbean@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, March 1, 2008 11:22:55 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Live Free Learn Free magazine

Funny you mentioned this. I was recently thinking about it. I
subscribed last September or so and never received anything. I
assumed the magazine no longer existed. The website is now very out
of date. I'm pretty sure i did get charged though. :-(

--- In unschoolingbasics@ yahoogroups. com, Jackson <jackson@... > wrote:
>
> Hi all, I have a question maybe someone on this list can help me
> with? I subscribed (by check) to Live Free Learn Free last spring and
> received one paper issue, which I wore thin reading and re-reading
> and passed along to another friend who is considering opting out of
> kindergarten (her youngest & my oldest will be 5 this spring).
> Anyway, I received no further issues and there seems to be no email
> (I've tried two) by which to get in touch with the editor? I heard
> it's gone paperless, but all the website talks about is making sure
> your paypal payment is up to date and you'll get it -- but I paid by
> check. Anyway, if anyone can help that'd be great, I am eager to read
> more issues.
> Thank you
> Elizabeth
>










____________________________________________________________________________________
Be a better friend, newshound, and
know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. Try it now. http://mobile.yahoo.com/;_ylt=Ahu06i62sR8HDtDypao8Wcj9tAcJ

messages.subject: Live Free Learn Free magazine
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a question maybe someone on this list can help me with? I subscribed (by check) to Live Free Learn Free last spring and received one paper
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I have a question maybe someone on this list can help me
with? I subscribed (by check) to Live Free Learn Free last spring and
received one paper issue, which I wore thin reading and re-reading
and passed along to another friend who is considering opting out of
kindergarten (her youngest & my oldest will be 5 this spring).
Anyway, I received no further issues and there seems to be no email
(I've tried two) by which to get in touch with the editor? I heard
it's gone paperless, but all the website talks about is making sure
your paypal payment is up to date and you'll get it -- but I paid by
check. Anyway, if anyone can help that'd be great, I am eager to read
more issues.
Thank you
Elizabeth
